document_data.name: Councilium of Prelates
document_data.mainbody: The '''Councilium of Prelates''' was the governing body of the fortified city of [[Saelmur]], in the [[Land of the Lions]] region of [[south Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Organization: The Councilium was made up of the [[priest|high priest]]s of each of Saelmur's seven largest faiths—the [[Church of Chauntea]], the [[Church of Helm]], the [[Church of Ilmater]], the [[Church of Lathander]], the [[Church of Oghma]], the [[Church of Torm]], and the [[Church of Tyr]].
document_data.History: Around the later 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a frequent topic of discussion during the Councilium's meetings was the [[Knights of the Black Gauntlet]]. and the neighboring city-state of [[Kzelter]] since [[1370 DR]].<ref> Many within the Councilium felt that war between Saelmur and the Knights was inevitable, but could not agree on how to approach the situation. The leader of the Church of Torm felt that they should strike soon, even threatening to wage an attack with just his own forces, while the leader of the Church of Tyr felt that the Saelmurrans had no chance of facing the Knights' forces without outside aid.
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Athelstan Meiados]], a [[paladin]] and the leader of the Tormtar temple known as the [[Shrine to Dusty]].
* [[Genos Stoutshield]], head Helmite priest of [[Guardian Hall]].
* [[Illian Jargos]], head Ilmatari priest of the [[Temple of Bound Hands]].
* [[Presman Taliemin]], head Oghmanyte priest of the [[Library of the Binder]].
* [[Santan Argath]], head Lathanderite priest of the [[Shrine of Rising Sun]].
* [[Thallon Geiros]], head Tyrran priest of the [[Hall of High Justice]].
* [[Thera Goldencorn]], head Chauntean priestess of the [[Lady's Sheaves]].
